articles.title: Fernando Mendoza's Hot Aunt Put America In A Trance While Indiana Humiliated Oregon - outkick.com
articles.content:
Ah yes, a tradition unlike any other. My favorite tradition in this country, frankly. Nope, not The Masters. Not Augusta. Whilst I do love that one, this one tops it by a mile.
